de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.transport

Interface TransportAttributes

  • All Superinterfaces:
    de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTransportAttributes

    public interface TransportAttributes
extends de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed
    Common attributes for every TransportConnection. Attributes are accessible thru getters as well as thru Attributed.

    • Method Summary

      Return the maximum full message length.

      Returns the maximum round trips for an integrity handshake supported by a TransportConnection.

      Returns the ID.
